mapper.select: select * from MEMBER WHERE sessionkey = #{loginCookie} AND sessionlimit > SYSTIMESTAMP();
select * from MEMBER where naverid = #{ naverid }
select * from MEMBER where googleid = #{ googleid }
select * from MEMBER where kakaoid = #{ kakaoid }
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO member (mid, mpw, naverid, googleid, kakaoid) VALUES (snsmid, #{mpw}, #{naverid}, #{googleid}, #{kakaoid}) INTO person (mid, pemail, pphone, pname) VALUES (snsmid, #{email}, '010-1111-1111', COALESCE(#{nickname}, #{mname}, snsmid)) SELECT substr(#{email}, 1, instr(#{email}, '@', 1, 1) - 1) snsmid FROM DUAL
